snippet: Police in Bangladesh's capital have arrested the spiritual leader of a banned militant group that is responsible for a series of attacks in the South Asian country, an official said Friday....

headline.main: Peak Gasoline Demand Looms With Engine Efficiency Gains
headline.print_headline: Peak Gasoline Demand Looms With Engine Efficiency Gains

lead_paragraph: Police in Bangladesh's capital have arrested the spiritual leader of a banned militant group that is responsible for a series of attacks in the South Asian country, an official said Friday.
